title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday

Save big on some of the most popular gifts this year. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

In my opinion, the best way to start the day is with a little deal hunting. It wakes you up with the rush of online shopping and price comparison, and you get to save a little on something you actually wanted. Today, there are some great deals on Amazon for products like Kindles, KitchenAid stand mixer, Apple AirPods, and more. Not only have we rigorously tested these things, but we used price tracking tools to assure you're getting your money's worth. See all the ways you can save this Tuesday.

1. Lowest price: Coveted Apple AirPods

Save big on these cult-favorite wireless headphones. (Photo: Reviewed / Michael Desjardin)

Since you were probably planning on getting Apple AirPods anyway, you might as well get them at a discount—even if it's just $15. Not only are these little white 'buds popular, but Apple AirPods are the best true wireless earphones out there. They are lightweight, connect easily to Apple products, and are completely wireless. These are also the latest generation of AirPods, so you know you're getting the best available for their best price.

Get Apple AirPods with Charging Case (Latest Model) for $144 (Save $15)

2. Save 30%: Treats for your furry friends

These popular pet treats are at their lowest prices. (Photo: Greenies / Temptations)

We all love to reward our pets with a little treat when they do something spectacular—like shake paws, pee outside, or just look so dang cute. Right now, you can save 30% on your furry friend's favorite treats as part of the Deal of the Day. This includes Greenies to keep their teeth shiny, the oh-so-addicting Temptations, DentaSticks, and natural dog treats. We want the best for our pets anyway, so you might as well save while you're treating them.

Save 30% on treats for pets

3. $70 off: A KitchenAid stand mixer

Mix your way into a great deal. (Photo: KitchenAid)

There are few things in life that look as good on a kitchen counter than a KitchenAid stand mixer—especially when you get it in a sleek color. Right now, you can get the 6 Quart Professional model for $70 off in the gorgeous cobalt blue color. Not only does this thing look good, but it performed well in our stand mixer tests. Plus, its large size is great for the bulk batches of Christmas cookies you'll be making this year.

Get the KitchenAid 6 Qt. Professional 600 Series Stand Mixer in Cobalt Blue for $279.99 (Save $70)

4. Under $20: A foam roller for achey muscles

Roll out so you can actually walk again. (Photo: Gaiam)

After a tough workout, your muscles might be so sore that it even hurts to sit. But a foam roller can help roll out the soreness in a way that hurts so good. This one from Gaiam is one of the best foam rollers we've ever tested. It's pretty basic, but it gets the job done—although it did seem a little flimsier than some of the other foam rollers we tested. Right now, it's just under $20 if you clip the on-page coupon

Get the Gaiam Restore Total Body Foam Roller for $19.95 (Save $10)

5. $40 off: The best Kindle on the market

Of all the Kindles, the Paperwhite is the best. (Photo: Reviewed.com/Michael Roorda)

Whether you're an avid reader or are searching for a gift for your favorite bookworm, this is the deal for you. Right now, the Kindle Paperwhite is just $90 for Prime members only, which is $5 more than its Prime Day price. This is an insane deal for anyone who wants to make reading on-the-go a little easier. It's the best e-reader we've ever tested because of its incredible interface and its recent upgrade to having twice the amount of storage and being waterproof. If you want cheaper Kindle with fewer bells and whistles, you can get the original Kindle for $25 off, too.

Get the Kindle Paperwhite for $89.99 (Save $40)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
